messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: 现在是2025年6月，我最近沉迷说唱，想知道格莱美奖最近30年都有哪些说唱类别的奖项，以及这些奖项的获奖歌曲/专辑的演唱者都是谁，奖项名称、获奖歌曲/专辑、演唱者都不需要翻译成中文，假如演唱者有feat也要一并纳入，例如 Killer Mike (ft. André 3000, Future & Eryn Allen Kane)，以官方给出的演唱者顺序为准。请以一整个Markdown表格的格式输出整理后的数据，不要拆分成多个markdown表格，每个单元格都需要按列名要求输出，不得无故省略，输出采用中文。
表格中的列名依次为：
届数、奖项名称、获奖歌曲/专辑、演唱者。不要问我任何问题，只需输出结果，输出格式为```markdown{数据内容}```?

<think>
首先，我们需要查询过去30年里每年的格莱美奖说唱类别的奖项名称及其获奖歌曲和演唱者。
</think>
<search> past 30 years hip hop grammy categories winners </search>

Search query: past 30 years hip hop grammy categories winners
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Best_Rap_Album):
Grammy Award for Best Rap Album - Wikipedia As of 2025, Eminem holds the record for the most wins in this category, with six. Lauryn Hill was the first female artist to win in this category, when she won ...

[Doc 2](https://www.albumoftheyear.org/user/sillas/list/188164/grammy-award-for-best-rap-album-winners-and-nominees/):
Grammy Award for Best Rap Album (Winners and nominees) - List All winners and nominees for the Grammy Award for Best Rap Album since the category was first introduced at the 1996 Grammy Awards.

[Doc 3](https://grammy.com/news/exploring-the-rap-winners):
Exploring The Rap Winners | GRAMMY.com The Rap Field at the 54th Annual GRAMMY Awards belonged to Kanye West. The Chicago rapper/producer won in each of the four rap categories.
<search>具体说唱类别的格莱美奖获奖信息 </search>

Search query: 具体说唱类别的格莱美奖获奖信息
Result: [Doc 1](https://zh.wikipedia.org/zh-hans/%E7%AC%AC67%E5%B1%86%E8%91%9B%E8%90%8A%E7%BE%8E%E7%8D%8E):
第67届格莱美奖 - 维基百科 肯德里克·拉马尔的歌曲《不像我们》获得年度制作、年度歌曲、最佳音乐视频、最佳说唱表演、最佳说唱歌曲等五个奖项；碧昂丝的专辑《牛仔卡特》获得年度专辑与最佳乡村专辑； ...

[Doc 2](https://www.reddit.com/r/EDM/comments/1aj73m9/grammys_recap/?tl=zh-hans):
格莱美回顾: r/EDM 格莱美把年度最佳重金属专辑奖颁给了Jethro Tull，而Metallica 和Guns N Roses 也有提名。 觉得他们懂音乐就好像让Paula Abdul 去当歌唱比赛的评委一样。

[Doc 3](https://www.reddit.com/r/bangtan/comments/17s6r6d/231110_recording_academy_grammys_2024_grammy/?tl=zh-hans):
231110 录音学院/格莱美奖- 在这里观看直播: r/bangtan - Reddit 我也很高兴看到Kelly Clarkson获得了最佳流行演唱专辑的提名，而且也很喜欢Paramore在另类和摇滚类别的提名。 我得说，如果《I' ...
